$mobile-badge-font-size: 13px; $brand-info: #38AAF4 !default; .elc-card-container { height: 100%; display: block; border-radius: 0.4rem; } .elc-favorite .fa { color: $tropical-rain; } .elc-flex-card { min-height: 134px; } .elc-card-image-container { display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; } .elc-item-image { min-width: 70px; height: 70px; border-radius: 5px; align-self: flex-start; margin-right: 1rem; } .elc-card-text-container { display: flex; flex-flow: column nowrap; align-items: flex-start; justify-content: space-evenly; word-break: break-word; } .elc-item-title { min-height: 20px; color: $text-primary;
